getLatestPriceInETH(address).details: Converts the asset price (e.g., in USD) into ETH.

params.asset: The pair name of the asset (e.g., USDC/ETH, USDT/ETH) for which the price is being requested.

returns._0: The price of the asset in ETH.

setChainlinkPriceFeed(address,address).details: Adds a new asset and its price feed.

params.asset: The pair name of the asset (e.g., USDC/ETH, USDT/ETH).
params.priceFeed: The address of the Chainlink price feed for that asset.
